Humboldt County Library’s main branch at 1313 Third St. in Eureka.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: More women than men struggle to fall asleep in both Europe and the US, study finds - CNN
articles.description: More women than men suffer from insomnia in the United States, the United Kingdom and the Netherlands, according to a new study of over a million people. So do smokers and people who are overweight. Here's how to get some zzzs.

articles.title: Researchers find coronavirus was circulating in Italy earlier than thought - Reuters
articles.description: The new coronavirus was circulating in Italy in September 2019, a study by the National Cancer Institute (INT) of the Italian city of Milan shows, signaling that it might have spread beyond China earlier than thought.

articles.title: Antibiotic use before age 2 risks allergies, asthma, ADHD, and obesity, study finds - RT
articles.description: New research has warned that babies and toddlers who receive antibiotics are more likely to develop childhood health issues, such as asthma, eczema, hay fever, food allergies, and celiac disease.
articles.content: A study published on Sunday in the journal Mayo Clinic Proceedings says that childhood health issues are more common in children who received one or more doses of antibiotics before the age of two. … [+1809 chars]
